summary: This document is an email chain between attorneys and a federal prosecutor regarding the Epstein case in the Southern District of New York. It discusses scheduling calls and meetings, and references a prior meeting with an unnamed individual.

persons.name: William H Kaiser
persons.context: Attorney from Kaiser Saurborn & Mair, P.C., copied on emails regarding scheduling calls about the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The email chain shows coordination between defense attorneys and federal prosecutors in the SDNY Epstein case in July 2019.
It references a prior meeting where defense attorneys met with an unnamed individual, which was appreciated by prosecutors.
The correspondence indicates active case discussions and scheduling efforts shortly before Epstein's death in August 2019.
